description:
Position Description

This position is a NAWCWD administrative support position located at Point Mugu, California

The incumbent of this position provides office services to an organization of limited organization complexity. It may include several subordinate organization levels but the work is directed primarily through face-to-face meetings. Internal administrative and procedural controls are informal.

OR

The incumbent of this position provides administrative support services of a specialized nature. This may include financial tracking, facilities management support, personnel and manpower management support, personnel or physical security or ADP systems controls. The work may be complicated by a variety of processes or procedural requirements.

MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITES

  • Serves as Office Manager for organization defined above in introduction.
  • Implements a variety of administrative processes in support of the work unit, which has essentially singular missions and functions.
  • Processes moderately complex administrative documents by researching and applying instructions, policies or procedures of the specialty area.
  • Applies knowledge of own office and its functions in order to provide the administrative support services required including: maintaining time and attendance records; typing and/or preparing travel requests, advances and vouchers; requisitioning office supplies, equipment , and publications, and similar office support duties.

Position Duties/Responsibilities

N/A

Minimum Salary

41,132

Maximum Salary

66,692
